entry.title: never let me go
entry.summary:
Author: angelfic

Summary: You've returned to Gotham after a few years away, having left as soon as you could to escape the constant reminders of your deceased best friend, Jason Todd. You expected to be haunted by the ghost of him the minute you stepped foot in the city, but certainly not like this — the city you call home has much more in store than you could have imagined.[jason todd x reader]

entry.title: Life itself
entry.summary:
Author: batcrap

Summary: Entirely self-indulgent horse shit about a reader insert and Jason Todd.You and Jason were close before his passing—his death left an insatiable hole in your heart. It's hard to imagine his reaction to you like this, lost in your grief 5 years later. entry.title: dog tags and daydreams
entry.summary:
Author: redlinedprose

Summary: the first time you meet jason todd, he’s bleeding all over your floor.there’s dirt smudged across his face, a split lip curving into something that isn’t quite a grin but tries to be. his tactical vest hangs crooked, straps torn, and his dog tags—clinking softly with every shaky breath—are stained dark. someone shoves him onto the cot like he’s nothing more than cargo.
